name: Colony 02
description:
* 30 min to 1 hour of GamePlay (if you finish every level in your first try)

* 10+ Enemy Type

* An Original Story

* 19 Levels

This game is a hard space shooter where you can shoot, dodge and kill enemy spaceships.

If you want to further support me or are interested in the making of this game, you can subscribe to my youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4k8M5WEt8hit0f9aeSsKRg/featured
